frontmatter.title: Is Docker, Kubernetes necessary for frontend development?
frontmatter.spoiler: I am an aspiring Front end developer. Currently doing self study on Html, Css, JavaScript and React. I've a question - as a frontend developer do you use Linux, docker, kubernetes?
